prompts: Create a majestic Pokemon with antlers and a vibrant rainbow tail.
I want a mythical creature that embodies life and nature with elegant features.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that can manipulate forest energies and light.
Make a graceful creature with a sleek body and colorful wings.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents harmony and balance in the ecosystem.
Design a fairy-type Pokemon with dazzling colors and a serene presence.
Show me a Pokemon with a strong connection to nature and mythical powers.
